name: react-with-tailwind-spa-blueprint
description: Implementation of React single page application with Tailwind
author: https://github.com/theManAndHisShadow

scripts.build:frontend: npm run clean:frontend && webpack --config webpack.frontend.config.js --env development
scripts.build:backend: npm run clean:backend && webpack --config webpack.backend.config.js --env development
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.build:frontend:prod: npm run clean:frontend && webpack --config webpack.frontend.config.js --env production
scripts.build:backend:prod: npm run clean:backend && webpack --config webpack.backend.config.js --env production
scripts.build:prod: npm run clean && npm run build:frontend:prod && npm run build:backend:prod
scripts.build:release: npm run build:prod && npm run update-version
